name: Greed Mania
description:
Welcome to Greed Mania! A game where you control Gary Greedster, a greedy man who have to collect all the treasures he can. The more treasure he gets, the more gang members he attracts.

Features:

* Two game modes: Battle your way through waves of enemies or go after all the gold you can non-stop!

* Dodge different Gangs and even their trucks!

* The Police may arrest some gang members... and you!

* Watch out for the tension! A rebellion may occur!

* Loads of achievements: Try to beat all the special challenges in the game!

Game, in game art by pcmxms

SFX by pcmxms using https://www.bfxr.net/

Box art by Kadaj (https://twitter.com/f5kn)

Powered By: Godot Engine (https://godotengine.org/)
